definition: Wang Yifu (1960-), male PRC pistol shooter and Olympic medalist
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Athletes of the shooting as Wang Yifu is a success.
sentences.chinese: 作爲射擊運動員的王義夫無疑是成功的。

sentences.english: You mean the two gold medals won by Zhang Shan and Wang Yifu.
sentences.chinese: 你是指張山和王義夫所得的兩枚金牌嗎？
